message: Looking for Ruby on Rails course in Alexandria , any help ??

data.message: My Vote Here Toooooooooooooooooooooo :)

I would suggest going with screencasts as we know we have a very big lake of good courses in Egypt. for Ruby on Rails o recommend you to check the screencasts of *Rails for Zumbies* http://railsforzombies.org/ or search for this course *Ruby on Rails Tutorial: Learn Rails by Example* in torrent websites :) http://ruby.railstutorial.org/

- Deployment is my killer Issue
- i need moreeeeeeee ... you know it is hard when you are a geek in PHP then just an amateur in ROR.

What i mean if i can build a blog with same structure like any blogg e.g. WordPress (Posts, Categories, Tags, Comments, Relations) etc...

and Deploy and Upload it ...  then i can say i'm good at ROR
